casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, v. John C. MYERS, Administrator of the Estate of F. E. Myers, Deceased. No. 7461. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. April 6, 1938. E. B. Freed, U. S. Atty., of Cleveland, Ohio, for appellant. Cannon, Spieth, Taggart, Spring & Ánnat, of Cleveland, Ohio, for appellee.

Before HICKS, SIMONS, and ALLEN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Pursuant to the stipulation hereto attached, it is hereby ordered, adjudged, and decreed by this court that the appeal taken in this case be, and the same is hereby, dismissed, each of the parties hereto to pay his own costs.

Appeal dismissed.
